template.name: Microbial eco-systems
template.description: Template for study-info of microbiome sampling studies

templateField.name: Objectives
templateField.comment: Aim and scientific questions of the study

templateField.name: Study type
templateField.comment: Type of study (edit template to add choices)

templateField.name: Study protocol
templateField.comment: Text file with study protocol

templateField.name: Institute
templateField.comment: Name, adres, website of Institute where the study was performed

templateField.name: Central conclusion
templateField.comment: Main Conclusions from study

template.name: Diet challenge
template.description: Template for fasting or feeding intervention or challenge.

templateField.name: Event name (STRING)
templateField.comment: Short event name that is unique in this study, e.g: cHF (chow high fat), Diclofenac, Fast, Feed. Note: full diet descriptions and shortcodes are filed under study info.

templateField.name: Intervention/Challenge
templateField.comment: Event-type, e.g: intervention, challenge (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Event-type
templateField.comment: Event-type (corresponds with template), e.g: diet, compound, feed, fast (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Describe Event, e.g: fasting or feeding time of day, length of period, type and quantity of food.

template.name: Adipose Tissue
template.description: Adipose Tissue

template.name: Skeletal muscle tissue
template.description: Skeletal muscle tissue

templateField.name: Route
templateField.comment: Administer route of diet or compound: e.g oral, subcutaneous, (edit template to add choices).

templateField.comment: Describe Event, e.g: fasting or feeding time of day, length of period, type and quantity of food.

template.name: BloodPressure
template.description: measurement of different blood pressure related features

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Compound Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full compoud name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes.

templateField.name: Compound name dbNP
templateField.comment: Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

template.name: ClinChemCells.v000
template.description: For cell typing/counting measurements: - unit - simple cell name - cell ontology - version - description

templateField.name: Unit (unique)
templateField.comment: Validated unit symbol

templateField.name: Cell name dbNP
templateField.comment: Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

templateField.name: Cell ontology
templateField.comment: Cell ontology Id. Multiple allowed (Id,Id,…).

templateField.name: Cell Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full cell-type name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Original Cell Name
templateField.comment: Original short name used to indicate cell assay.

templateField.name: Protein name dbNP
templateField.comment: Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

templateField.name: Gene ontology
templateField.comment: Gene ontology Id, eg: GI:468181829

templateField.name: Protein Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full protein name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes. Eg. from ncbi DEFINITION: "xylanase [Prevotella ruminicola]

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

template.name: Metabolomics.v000
template.description: Contains following fields: Name, Unit, Unit(unique), Version, Compound Id, Ontology, Biochemical name, Description

templateField.name: Unit (unique)
templateField.comment: Validated unit symbol

templateField.name: Compound name dbNP
templateField.comment: Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

templateField.name: Compound Id in Metabolic platform
templateField.comment: Compound Id from the actual metabolomics platform. Preferably shortest unique name or code.

templateField.name: Compound ontology
templateField.comment: "Compound/Metabolomics ontology Id. Multiple Id's allowed (Id,Id,...). If needed combine ontology-db-code:compoundcode (eg. CHEBI:5931,SNOMED:85600001,NDF:N0000168565,HMDB00651)."

templateField.name: Compound Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full compoud name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

template.name: Physiology.v000
template.description: Fields for: - validated Unit - validated Feature - validated version. - description

templateField.name: Unit (unique)
templateField.comment: Validated unit symbol

templateField.name: Physiology name dbNP
templateField.comment: Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full gene name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes. Eg. from ncbi DEFINITION: Aspergillus niger culture-collection CICC:40616 xylanase B (xynB).

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Unit (unique)
templateField.comment: Validated unit symbol

template.name: ClinChemProtein.v000
template.description: For single protein measurements: - unit - simple protein name - protein ontology - version. - description

templateField.name: Unit (unique)
templateField.comment: Validated unit symbol

templateField.name: Protein name dbNP
templateField.comment: Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

templateField.name: Protein ontology
templateField.comment: "Protein ontology Id. Multiple allowed (Id,Id,…), eg: CAA31109.1"

templateField.name: Protein Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full protein name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes. Eg. from ncbi DEFINITION: "xylanase [Prevotella ruminicola]

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Gene ontology
templateField.comment: Gene ontology Id, eg: GI:468181829

templateField.name: Original Protein Name
templateField.comment: Original short name used to indicate protein assay.

template.name: Default
template.description: General template

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Compound Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full compoud name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: CDF
templateField.comment: Chip description file used.

templateField.name: Quality control

templateField.name: Raw data
templateField.comment: Raw data.

template.name: qPCR.v000
template.description: Fields for: - validated Unit - validated Feature - validated Ontology - validated version. - description

templateField.name: Unit (unique)
templateField.comment: Validated unit symbol

templateField.name: qPCR name
templateField.comment: dropdown Feature name without version number (for grouping feature-versions).

templateField.name: qPCR For-primer
templateField.comment: Forward PCR-primer, 5'-->3' sequence (nt), eg: gatggcatga

templateField.name: qPCR Rev-primer
templateField.comment: Detection/Probe-primer, 5'-->3' sequence (nt), eg: gatggcatga

templateField.name: qPCR Probe-primer
templateField.comment: Reverse PCR-primer, 5'-->3' sequence (nt), eg: gatggcatga

templateField.name: Gene ontology
templateField.comment: Gene ontology Id, eg: GI:468181829

templateField.name: Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full gene name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes. Eg. from ncbi DEFINITION: Aspergillus niger culture-collection CICC:40616 xylanase B (xynB).

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

templateField.name: Reference For-primer
templateField.comment: Forward PCR-primer, 5'-->3' sequence (nt), eg: gatggcatga

templateField.name: Reference Rev-primer
templateField.comment: Detection/Probe-primer, 5'-->3' sequence (nt), eg: gatggcatga

templateField.name: Reference Probe-primer
templateField.comment: Detection/Probe-primer, 5'-->3' sequence (nt), eg: gatggcatga

templateField.name: Reference Gene ontology
templateField.comment: Gene ontology Id, eg: GI:468181829

templateField.name: Reference Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full gene name(s) and shortcode(s), for lookup purposes. Eg. from ncbi DEFINITION: Aspergillus niger culture-collection CICC:40616 xylanase B (xynB).

template.name: Physical activity challenge
template.description: Calorimetry Period. May overlap with sub-events like Feed, Fast, Sampling.

templateField.name: Event name (STRING)
templateField.comment: Short event name that is unique in this study, e.g: cHF (chow high fat), Diclofenac, Fast, Feed. Note: full diet descriptions and shortcodes are filed under study info.

templateField.name: Event-type
templateField.comment: Event-type (corresponds with template), e.g: diet, compound, feed, fast (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Describe Event, e.g: fasting or feeding time of day, length of period, type and quantity of food.

template.name: Sample Details
template.description: Template for sample details, e.g: storage, quality, quantity.

templateField.name: Comments
templateField.comment: Give comments about sample, e.g: description, color, preparation, freezing method, vial-type, storage location & temperature, etc.

templateField.name: Quality
templateField.comment: Indicate if sample is good, suspect or bad (under comments a reason can be given).

templateField.name: Size
templateField.comment: Decimal, sample size (give unit in next field)

templateField.name: Size unit
templateField.comment: Unit for sample size, (edit template to add choices).

template.name: Microbiome eco-system subject
template.description: Microbiome sampling subject template.

templateField.name: Subject description
templateField.comment: Subject details, e.g: description, objective or time unrelated treatments. (note: describe time-related treatments and sampling via "event ").

templateField.name: GPS coordinate
templateField.comment: GPS location of sample obtained, e.g: N 52 7 36.3, E 4 39 29.5

templateField.name: Name/Address
templateField.comment: Name of location/factory/institution and address, sample obtained: name/street/nr/city/zipcode/country, e.g. Factory/iI.

templateField.name: City/Area
templateField.comment: City/Area, sample obtained: e.g. London, Amsterdam, North Sea (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Country (STRINGLIST)
templateField.comment: Country, sample obtained (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Location category
templateField.comment: Location category, sample obtained: e.g. backery, air, forest, sea, soil, office, farm (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Study/Treatment Group
templateField.comment: Group of Subjects belonging to the same experimental (treatment) group.

templateField.name: Questionnumber
templateField.comment: number of the question in the questionnaire

templateField.name: Answers
templateField.comment: Answers to the questions, which semicolons in between

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Notes/References to feature method or version

template.name: Human
template.description: Human subject template

templateField.name: Ethnicity (STRINGLIST)
templateField.comment: Ethnic group (edit template to add choices)

templateField.name: Gender
templateField.comment: Gender (choose)

templateField.name: Age (years)
templateField.comment: Either include age at the start of the study or date of birth (if known)

templateField.name: Body weight (DOUBLE)
templateField.comment: Decimal, Body weight, at study start.

templateField.name: Weight unit
templateField.comment: Weight unit (edit template to add choices)

templateField.name: Body height
templateField.comment: Decimal, Body height, at study start.

templateField.name: BMI
templateField.comment: Decimal, Body Mass Index (BMI), at study start.

templateField.name: Hip circumference
templateField.comment: Decimal, Hip circumference, at the level of the two bony prominences front of the hips, at study start.

templateField.name: Waist circumference
templateField.comment: Decimal, Waist circumference, just above the hip bone, at study start.

templateField.name: Waist hip ratio
templateField.comment: Decimal, Waist hip ratio, at study start.

templateField.name: Diastolic blood pressure
templateField.comment: Decimal, Diastolic pressure, at study start.

templateField.name: Systolic blood pressure
templateField.comment: Decimal, Systolic pressure, at study start.

templateField.name: Heart rate
templateField.comment: Decimal, Heart rate, at study start.

templateField.name: Glucose fasting value
templateField.comment: Decimal, Glucose fasting, at study start.

templateField.name: Glucose unit
templateField.comment: Unit, Glucose (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Insulin fasting value
templateField.comment: Decimal, Insulin fasting, at study start.

templateField.name: Insulin unit
templateField.comment: Unit, Insulin (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Medication/Supplement/Diet use
templateField.comment: Summarize per subject adverse events before/during study (not study objectives).

templateField.name: Adverse events
templateField.comment: Summarize per subject adverse events at/before study start.

templateField.name: Subject description
templateField.comment: Subject details, e.g: description, objective or time unrelated treatments. (note: describe time-related treatments and sampling via "event ").

templateField.name: FVC%
templateField.comment: Forced vital capacity (expressed as a percentage of the normal expected value)

templateField.name: DLCO%
templateField.comment: Diffse capacity for carbon monoxide (expressed as a percentage of the normal expected value)

templateField.name: Occupancy
templateField.comment: main occupacy subject

template.name: Animal
template.description: Animal subject template

templateField.name: Strain
templateField.comment: Strain of Subject (in vivo) or Cell Line Name (in vitro). Edit template to add choices, preferably add names from ontology.

templateField.name: Strain ontology DB name
templateField.comment: Name of database with strain names (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Genotype
templateField.comment: Strain specification, e.g. genetic modification, sub.strain (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Mother id
templateField.comment: Code identifying mother

templateField.name: Gender
templateField.comment: Gender (choose)

templateField.name: Age
templateField.comment: Age, at study start, use rel. time, e.g: 8s, 7m, 6h, 5d, 4w, 2y

templateField.name: Body weight (DOUBLE)
templateField.comment: Decimal, Body weight, at study start.

templateField.name: Weight unit
templateField.comment: Weight unit (edit template to add choices)

templateField.name: Cage type during study
templateField.comment: Short term for type of cage, (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Cage id during study
templateField.comment: Cage identifier, unique in this study.

templateField.name: Animals/cage
templateField.comment: Natural number, Animals per cage.

templateField.name: Cage id before study
templateField.comment: Cage identifier, unique in this study.

templateField.name: Run-in diet
templateField.comment: Short diet code, unique in this study (full diet description under events; file).

templateField.name: Subject description
templateField.comment: Subject details, e.g: description, objective or time unrelated treatments. (note: describe time-related treatments and sampling via "event ").

templateField.name: Study/Treatment Group
templateField.comment: Group of Subjects belonging to the same experimental (treatment) group.

template.name: Body fluid
template.description: Template for Body fluids (e.g: blood, lymph).

templateField.name: Sampling name short
templateField.comment: Sampling name, short,unique in this study, e.g: physiology, feces, blood, heart, BAT, WAT.

templateField.name: Sampling-type
templateField.comment: Sampling-type, e.g: physiology, excrement, body fluid, organ/ bodypart, (edit template to add choices). Should correspond with chosen sampling template.

templateField.name: Body fluid
templateField.comment: Bodyfluid, e.g: blood, lymph, (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Related Event/Chall.
templateField.comment: Event, mostly a challenge, related with sampling (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Relative time in related event
templateField.comment: Relative time in related event (start=0s): e..g: 8s, 7m, 6h, 5d, 4w, 2y.

templateField.name: Sampling method
templateField.comment: Sampling method, e.g: syringe, tailcut, sacrifice, scraping, (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Sample fraction
templateField.comment: Organ fraction, e.g: whole organ, white adipose tissue, white bloodcells, plasma (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Sampling description
templateField.comment: If needed, describe sampling event in more detail, e.g treatment before sampling (time of day, food intake/type/quantity/time).

template.name: Compound intervention
template.description: Template for compound-intervention (e.g. treatment with diclofenac) or compound-challenge (e.g. glucose tolerance).

templateField.name: Event name (STRING)
templateField.comment: Short event name that is unique in this study, e.g: cHF (chow high fat), Diclofenac, Fast, Feed. Note: full diet descriptions and shortcodes are filed under study info.

templateField.name: Intervention/Challenge
templateField.comment: Event-type, e.g: intervention, challenge (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Event-type
templateField.comment: Event-type (corresponds with template), e.g: diet, compound, feed, fast (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Route
templateField.comment: Administer route of diet or compound: e.g oral, subcutaneous, (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Vehicle
templateField.comment: Vehicle that is used to adminster a compound or diet: e.g. adjuvance (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Compound full name
templateField.comment: Detailed name, unique in this database, pref. from compound database (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Compound (DB:id name)
templateField.comment: Format: DataBaseId:CompoundId[space]CompoundName

templateField.name: Compound dose
templateField.comment: Decimal value, single dose.

templateField.name: Compound dose unit
templateField.comment: Unit, single dose, e.g. mg, g, (edit template to add choices).

templateField.name: Compound frequency
templateField.comment: Value and unit, frequency over event period, e.g.: 3 times/day .

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Describe Event, e.g: fasting or feeding time of day, length of period, type and quantity of food.

templateField.comment: Organ fraction, e.g: whole organ, white adipose tissue, white bloodcells, plasma (edit template to add choices).

templateField.comment: If needed, describe sampling event in more detail, e.g treatment before sampling (time of day, food intake/type/quantity/time).
